entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:53 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 09:44 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.3°C

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 83 %

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain early this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
